data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing reimbursement policy for the specified projectId using PATCH semantics. Accepts policy-update-input containing fields such as policy name, rules, limits, and approval settings. Only provided fields are updated; omitted fields remain unchanged. Returns the updated reimbursement policy object. Requires API Key authentication.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate. Description lacks specificity about what fields can be updated, PATCH semantics, return value, and authentication requirements. Enhanced to clarify partial update behavior and authentication for AI agent clarity.

data.current_description: Reset an existing policy to match with templatePolicy
data.description_suggestion: Resets an existing reimbursement policy to match the specified templatePolicy configuration. Accepts policy-reset-input containing the policy identifier and template reference. All custom modifications are reverted to template defaults. Returns the reset policy object with restored template settings. Requires API Key authentication. This action cannot be undone.
data.reasoning: Summary is vague about the reset action. Description lacks clarity on what gets reset, input requirements, return value, and irreversibility. Enhanced to clarify the reset scope, input/output details, authentication, and important side effect about irreversibility.
